workshoptitle: Navigating Oracle Troubleshooting: AHF Insights Enhanced by AI and LLMs

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: This is an introduction to help you understand how Oracle Autonomous Framework (AHF) helps with Oracle Database Troubleshooting

tutorials.title: Get Started with LiveLabs
tutorials.description: Getting you connected with your LiveLabs Sandbox Environment

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Check and Upgrade AHF on your System
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through checking that AHF is installed and healthy, then Upgrade to the latest version.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Generate some Incidents in RAC Database
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through generating various incidents in your RAC datase for AHF to detect.

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Review/Generate AHF Incident Diagnostic Collections
tutorials.description: This lab reviews automatic collections and helps you generate manual diagnostic collections.

tutorials.title: Lab 4: learn the most Commonly used AHF Commands
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through using the most commonly used AHF commands

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Generate AHF Insights reports on Demand
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through generating an Insights Report on Demand.

tutorials.title: Lab 6: Review Insights Reports for Various Incident Scenarios
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through a number of Insights Reports for various incidents captured from other systems

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
